title: Gambling Mayor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, reveal yourself as the Gambling Mayor.
- During the day, learn what is your current amount of votes. (1 use)
- During the day, make a low risk gamble, the next time your votes get rerolled they will be between 1 to 5. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For the rest of the game, Your amount of votes will be randomized, it will be chosen from -2 to 7, it is rerolled at the end of every day.
- You do not know how many votes you have.
- If you have -1 or -2 votes, voting a player will secretly reduce the votes on them.
